short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced Visual Inspector for Editing Web Page Elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visual Inspect UI is a powerful tool designed for interactive web element inspection. It enables users to inspect and modify the styles and text content of web elements with ease.

Key Features:

Fixed Sidebar Panel: Positioned on the right side of your screen, the fixed sidebar panel offers a consistent and convenient interface for element inspection.

User-Friendly Interface: The tool features a clean and intuitive interface, making it simple for users to navigate and inspect elements.

Modern Styling: Visual Inspect UI boasts a contemporary design, including a translucent background, shadow effects, and easy-to-read fonts, enhancing the user experience.
